alert.note: Alert for Crowley County; Eastern Kiowa County; La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Western Kiowa County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued August 07 at 2:27AM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM MDT THIS AFTERNOON THROUGH THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...Crowley, Kiowa and Otero counties. * WHEN...From 2 PM MDT this afternoon through this evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Monsoon moisture combined with post-frontal upslope winds will increase the risk of heavy rain producing thunderstorms and flash flooding across the area. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Crowley County; Eastern Kiowa County; La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Western Kiowa County
